description: React component 'Discover' that fetches a list of videos from a backend API and displays them in a grid using the FilmCard component. Handles loading, error, and empty states, normalizes various possible backend data fields, and provides placeholder images if needed.

methods.name: Discover()
methods.description: React functional component that fetches video data from backend API, normalizes data, and displays video film cards with loading and error handling.

methods.name: pickPreviewImage
methods.description: Function to select appropriate preview image for each film, falling back to placeholders if necessary.
